{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DWR 118 A1 Image L Side.png |image1_size = 200px |caption = Wireless AC750 Dual-Band Multi-WAN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.dlink.com/uk/en/products/dwr-118-wireless-ac750-dual-band-multi-wan-router |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DWR-118_rev_A1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DWR-118 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = E |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/13/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DWR-118_rev_A1 |wlclass = AC750 |series = DWR-118 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2WR118A1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = WR7620A-183AA-DL |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6405D; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> <!-- (in US version) |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q128FV; |flash2size = 16 (in EU version) -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP1001LF; |eth3chip = IC+;IP1001LF; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |lan2_ports = 3 |lan2_speed = 100MbE |totlan = 4 |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A0:AB:1B |oui = A0:AB:1B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Jboot<!--CDW57CDL_003 Jboot B895, (JRecovery Version R1.2 2015/08/31 17:24)--> |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, J1,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = DWR-118_XXXXXX, DWR-118_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WR7620A |manuf_rev = -183AA-DL REV:1.2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/23/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00PVDD7C4 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Ports: *WAN: 1x GbE (10/100/1000) ports *LAN: 3x FE (10/100) + 1x GbE (10/100/1000) ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (3G/4G LTE modem backup support)
Antennas: *2x external 5dBi antennas (2.4/5 GHz) *1x internal 5dBi antenna (2.4 GHz)
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/CHKDSK88/openwrt-1/commit/4d8844df04a08ce2eb82acf4fd39a4139650f63f Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWrt'''] :(''openwrt-CHKDSK88 - Pawe≈Ç Dembicki'') *[http://eko.one.pl/forum/viewtopic.php?id=15977 On the '''eko.one.pl''' forums]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dwr-118_a1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dwr-118 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== J1 - 4-pin header (57600, 8n1)
{{/Serial info}}
